mizarlabs.transformers.utils.convert_to_timestamp(datetime_array: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray[source]¶

Convert a datetime array to timestamp in milliseconds.

Nans are converted to negatives values

Parameters

datetime_array – An array of datetimes

Returns

array of timestamps

Return type

np.ndarray
